description:
The Medical Calculator Pro is useful for all medical students, doctors. 
This application contains all useful medical calculators. And  You can make a calculations like 
 1. Anion Gap, 
 2. APGAR Score, 
 3. Blood Donation Time Calculation,
 4. Blood Volume Calculator,
 5. Body Surface Area Calculation Using DuBois Formula,
 6. Body Surface Area Calculation Using Mosteller formula,
 7. Calories Needs Per Day Calculation,
 8. Diabetes Mellitus Criteria (ADA) Diagnosis
 10.International Normalized Ration (INR) Calculation
 11.Calories Consumption Calculation
 12.Pulmonary Vascular Resistance (PVR) Calculation
 13.IBW & ABW
 14.Blood Alcohol Content
 15.Blood Sugar / A1C Calculator
